Name: Greed: Abandoned Dogs
About the game: GREED: Abandoned Dogs is a third-person shooter game. You get to travel back in time using a time machine and plunder ancient relics and treasures. Fight against soldiers in the past or other players, and climb the ladder to go from rags to riches. 1. Plunder Mode - GREED: Abandoned Dogs is a tactical survival battlefield. There are two modes: PVE as in fighting against NPCs and PVP where you must plunder all of the treasures from other players. The key is to escape using the time machine after plundering the treasures, so make sure to remember how to keep your treasure safe! 2. Survival Mode - ‘You must survive. Only the last survivor can return to present time.’ The game ends when your opponents are killed, or you are dead, or you succeed to escape. The reward from the relic will be calculated from the appraisal center, and this will determine the wealth you gain from the fight.
